      • getAllTasks

        public java.util.List<Task> getAllTasks()
        Gets a list of all tasks upon start of app. LiveData not used due to race conditions inherent to app.
        Returns:
        a list of all tasks

        Gets a list of all events upon start of app. LiveData not used due to race conditions inherent to app.

        a list of all events
